ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] stuck on luclin quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t know about the quest, but I do know that the young rockhoppers in the pit drop gravel pit leaves. Perhaps these are what you re looking for? They
ygData.messageBody:
--- stotty_k <karen@...> wrote:
> Now by under the city I assumed he means the newbie
> pit have looked
> all over and cannot find any leaves does anyone here
> know of this
> quest? and if so where should I be looking?

I don't know about the quest, but I do know that the
young rockhoppers in the pit drop gravel pit leaves.
Perhaps these are what you're looking for? They tend
to spawn around the north gate...

-Hanna
